mapper.update:
update saas_distr_in_notice
enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
order_type = #{orderType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_date = #{orderDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
base_order_id = #{baseOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
base_order_type = #{baseOrderType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
base_order_code = #{baseOrderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
base_order_date = #{baseOrderDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
distr_unit_id = #{distrUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
distr_unit_code = #{distrUnitCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
distr_unit_name = #{distrUnitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
storage_man_id = #{storageManId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
storage_man_code = #{storageManCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
storage_man_name = #{storageManName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
distr_type = #{distrType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
quantity_total = #{quantityTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
varieties_quantity = #{varietiesQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
amount_total = #{amountTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
whole_discount = #{wholeDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
whole_discount_amount = #{wholeDiscountAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
real_amount_total = #{realAmountTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
notax_real_amount_total = #{notaxRealAmountTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
tax_amount_total = #{taxAmountTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creater_id = #{createrId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
creater_code = #{createrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creater_name = #{createrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifier_id = #{modifierId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
modifier_code = #{modifierCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modifier_name = #{modifierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
outbound_unit_id = #{outboundUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
outbound_unit_code = #{outboundUnitCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
outbound_unit_name = #{outboundUnitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update saas_distr_in_notice set enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, order_type = #{orderType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_date = #{orderDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, base_order_id = #{baseOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, base_order_type = #{baseOrderType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, base_order_code = #{baseOrderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, base_order_date = #{baseOrderDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, distr_unit_id = #{distrUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, distr_unit_code = #{distrUnitCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, distr_unit_name = #{distrUnitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, storage_man_id = #{storageManId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, storage_man_code = #{storageManCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, storage_man_name = #{storageManName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, distr_type = #{distrType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, quantity_total = #{quantityTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, varieties_quantity = #{varietiesQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, amount_total = #{amountTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, whole_discount = #{wholeDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, whole_discount_amount = #{wholeDiscountAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, real_amount_total = #{realAmountTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, notax_real_amount_total = #{notaxRealAmountTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, tax_amount_total = #{taxAmountTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creater_id = #{createrId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, creater_code = #{createrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creater_name = #{createrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifier_id = #{modifierId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modifier_code = #{modifierCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modifier_name = #{modifierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, outbound_unit_id = #{outboundUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, outbound_unit_code = #{outboundUnitCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, outbound_unit_name = #{outboundUnitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update saas_distr_in_notice set status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT notice.id , notice. CODE , notice.order_date , notice.base_order_id, notice.distr_unit_id , notice.distr_unit_code , notice.distr_unit_name , notice.storage_man_id , notice.storage_man_code , notice.storage_man_name , notice.outbound_unit_id, notice.outbound_unit_code, notice.outbound_unit_name, notice.distr_type , notice.quantity_total , notice.amount_total , notice.whole_discount , notice.whole_discount_amount , notice.real_amount_total , notice.notax_real_amount_total , notice.tax_amount_total , notice. STATUS , notice.remark , dtl.id AS dtl_id , dtl.order_id , dtl.goods_id , dtl.goods_code , dtl.barcode , dtl.goods_name , dtl.goods_generic_name , dtl.dosage_id , dtl.dosage_name , dtl.unit_id , dtl.unit_name , dtl.goods_specification , dtl.manufacturer_id , dtl.manufacturer , dtl.goods_place , dtl.approval_number , dtl.quantity , dtl.unit_price , dtl.retail_price , dtl.member_price , dtl.line_discount , dtl.amount , dtl.whole_discount , dtl.line_discount_amount , dtl.real_price , dtl.real_amount , dtl.tax_rate_id , dtl.tax_rate , dtl.notax_real_price , dtl.notax_real_amount , dtl.tax_amount , dtl.unclear_quantity , dtl.clear_quantity , dtl.line_num , dtl.remark as dtl_remark
FROM saas_distr_in_notice notice JOIN saas_distr_in_notice_detail dtl ON dtl.order_id = notice.id WHERE notice.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT count(1) FROM saas_distr_in_notice_detail dtl WHERE
dtl.order_id in #{id}

SELECT id, order_date AS orderDate, code, distr_unit_id AS distrUnitId, distr_unit_code AS distrUnitCode, distr_unit_name AS distrUnitName, storage_man_id AS storageManId, storage_man_name AS storageManName,
outbound_unit_id as outboundUnitId, outbound_unit_code as outboundUnitCode, outbound_unit_name as outboundUnitName,
distr_type AS distrType, quantity_total AS quantityTotal, amount_total AS amountTotal, notax_real_amount_total AS notaxRealAmountTotal, tax_amount_total AS taxAmountTotal, status
FROM saas_distr_in_notice
order by id desc
order by ${order} ${sort}
limit #{pageStart},#{pageSize}

where.if: and ( c.code like CONCAT('%',#{param},'%') or c.barcode like CONCAT('%',#{param},'%') or c.name like CONCAT('%',#{param},'%') or c.generic_name like CONCAT('%',#{param},'%') or c.approval_number like CONCAT('%',#{param},'%') )

mapper.select: select count(1) from saas_distr_in_notice a INNER join saas_distr_in_notice_detail b on b.order_id=a.id INNER join saas_distr_out f on f.code=a.base_order_code INNER join saas_goods c on c.id=b.goods_id INNER join saas_enterprise d on d.id=a.enterprise_id INNER join saas_goods_category e on e.id=c.category_id

SELECT goods.id as id,goods.code as goodsCode,goods.name as goodsName, goods.generic_name as goodsGenericName,goods.place as goodsPlace,goods.unit_name AS unitName, goods.specification as goodsSpecification,goods.manufacturer_id as manufacturerId, goods.manufacturer as manufacturer,goods.dosage_name as dosageName, goods.chain_type as chainType, varieties.tax_rate as taxRate , business.purchase_tax_rate as purchaseTaxRate, varieties.tax_rate_id as taxRateId, business.purchase_tax_rate_id as purchaseTaxRateId, business.retail_price as retailPrice,business.member_price as memberPrice, business.distr_price as distrPrice,varieties.last_pur_price as unitPrice FROM saas_goods goods LEFT JOIN saas_goods_business business on goods.id = business.goods_id INNER JOIN saas_supplier supplier on supplier.id = #{supplierId} and find_in_set(goods.management_scope_id,supplier.business_scope_id) inner join saas_supplier_business sbu on sbu.supplier_id = supplier.id and sbu.management_mode = business.management_mode LEFT JOIN saas_supplier_business_varieties varieties on goods.id = varieties.goods_id and varieties.supplier_id = #{supplierId} where goods.approve_status = 1 and goods.status = 1 and goods.valid_flag = 1 and goods.goods_nature = 0
and goods.enterprise_id = #{commonParam.parentId} and goods.owner_id in (#{commonParam.parentId},#{commonParam.enterpriseId})
and goods.enterprise_id = #{commonParam.enterpriseId} and goods.owner_id = #{commonParam.enterpriseId}
AND ( INSTR(goods.name ,#{param}) OR INSTR(goods.code ,#{param}) OR INSTR(goods.generic_name ,#{param}) OR INSTR(goods.barcode ,#{param}) OR INSTR(goods.approval_number ,#{param}) OR INSTR(goods.pinyin_code ,#{param}) )
group by goods.id limit 100

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM saas_goods goods LEFT JOIN saas_goods_business business on goods.id = business.goods_id INNER JOIN saas_supplier supplier on supplier.id = #{supplierId} and find_in_set(goods.management_scope_id,supplier.business_scope_id) inner join saas_supplier_business sbu on sbu.supplier_id = supplier.id and sbu.management_mode = business.management_mode LEFT JOIN saas_supplier_business_varieties varieties on goods.id = varieties.goods_id and varieties.supplier_id = #{supplierId} where goods.approve_status = 1 and goods.status = 1 and goods.valid_flag = 1 and goods.goods_nature = 0
and goods.enterprise_id = #{commonParam.parentId} and goods.owner_id in (#{commonParam.parentId},#{commonParam.enterpriseId})
and goods.enterprise_id = #{commonParam.enterpriseId} and goods.owner_id = #{commonParam.enterpriseId}
AND ( INSTR(goods.name ,#{param}) OR INSTR(goods.code ,#{param}) OR INSTR(goods.generic_name ,#{param}) OR INSTR(goods.barcode ,#{param}) OR INSTR(goods.approval_number ,#{param}) OR INSTR(goods.pinyin_code ,#{param}) )
